name: Bloodthirst (Lucas Viana)
description:
After being sentenced to die in the arena for participating in a riot against his master. This roman slave decided that if he is going down, he might as well put up a fight. In Bloodthirst the player will use three different attacks, a defense, and a roll to try and kill as many gladiators as possible before perishing.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:
  • Survive! - Try to survive waves of enemies
  • Multiple weapons - There are multiple weapons and shields to choose
  • Stats - Different weapons means different stats
  • Score - Try to beat your own record

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
